sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Mat√©riel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:994d6354477a0110a06c690cd36d4355</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>adhocControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
      g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);  
        return;
    }

    if (newValue == 'ad_hoc') {
     g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", true);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", true);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", true);
	g_form.setMandatory("attachments", true);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", true);

    } else {
    g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
     g_form.setValue("nom_du_projet", "");
	g_form.setValue("date_souhait_e", "");
	g_form.setValue("date_du_co_proj", "");
	g_form.setValue("nom_du_directeur", "");
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
	g_form.setValue("attachments", "");			
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-14 23:00:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>adhocControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 00:15:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
	g_form.setValue("attachments", "");

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_91d9fd1447230110a06c690cd36d4313
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Mat√©riel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:015ce314477a0110a06c690cd36d439a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>showClientField</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
        g_form.setDisplay("client", false);
        return;
    }

    if (newValue == 'exceptional_request') {
        g_form.setDisplay("client", true);
    } else {
        g_form.setDisplay("client", false);
		g_form.setValue("client", "");
    }
    
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-14 22:54:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>91d9fd1447230110a06c690cd36d4313</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>showClientField</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_91d9fd1447230110a06c690cd36d4313</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 00:13:49</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
